item.description:
We'll have all of our usual activities, PLUS:
-- A "Found Poetry" or similar ATC challenge. All materials will be supplied; watch the Message Board for details.

UPDATE: Because of a scheduling conflict, the Button Box downstairs classroom is not available on our original Meetup date of Saturday, Nov. 15. Instead, we'll meet on Sunday, Nov. 16.
item.how_to_find_us: Blonde hair, funky glasses, khaki apron -- and a name tag

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: November Meetup in Wellesley--note date change to Sunday, Nov. 16
